jobDescription: DC/Northern VA Area * Service side of Insurance business5+ years of group Insurance experience with a minimum of 3+ years of supervisory and managerial skills. Must have a Life/Health Insurance license and group Insurance experience.This person is responsible for providing "best practices" sales, service and support to the assigned Regional Sales Office; producers, brokers, clients and administrative office staffYou will supervise/manage: Pre-sales specialist, client service specialist and regional account managers.Manage all in force and renewal activities to ensure timely resolution of service issues, delivery of renewal data, etc. the overall Regional Sales office and support workflow, servicing of the in-force block and improving customer satisfaction and retentionMust be able to achieve all required metrics relating to service delivery and persistency.
